articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: A Bitcoin white paper monument, sleep to earn, and a stablecoin merger were all jokes. And within crypto, they're also all plausible.
articles.title: Do Your Own Research: Crypto Fact and Fiction on April Fools' Day

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: But the investment bank thinks the tech still has a long way to go.
articles.title: Investment Bank Citi Is Bullish on the Metaverse, Predicts $13 Trillion Economy

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The SEC has denied an application from ARKInvest and 21Shares to create a Bitcoin spot ETF, citing concerns about lack of oversight.
articles.title: SEC Denies Bitcoin ETF From Cathie Wood’s ARK Invest

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Fractal’s seed round includes funding from Andreessen Horowitz, Solana Ventures, Coinbase, Animoca, Paradigm, and more.
articles.title: Twitch Co-Founder’s Solana Gaming NFT Platform Fractal Raises $35M

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The SEC will require companies holding users crypto to account for those assets, clearly disclosing their nature and amount.
articles.title: US Companies Must Disclose Customer Crypto Holdings, Says SEC

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: You'll no longer need any crypto to buy an NFT on OpenSea—a move that could bring in more newcomers to the NFT space.
articles.title: OpenSea Enables NFT Purchases With Credit Cards, Apple Pay

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: Binance announced it has poached senior executives from Microsoft and travel giant Agoda.
articles.title: Binance Hires Senior Microsoft Exec as CTO

articles.author: Ekin Genç
articles.description: With the tax deadline looming, it’s past time to get your paperwork in order. Here’s how to make the process of filing your crypto taxes simple.
articles.title: 9 Top Tips For Filing Your Crypto Taxes in 2022

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: New York regulators will make a final decision on controversial Bitcoin mining firm Greenidge Generation’s permit this summer.
articles.title: Regulators May Decide Greenidge’s Bitcoin Mining Fate in June

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The token behind the Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT collection has plunged overnight after the project’s Discord channel suffered a phishing scam.
articles.title: ApeCoin Drops 8% After Bored Ape Yacht Club Discord Suffers Phishing Scam

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Leading cryptocurrencies in Bitcoin and Ethereum both dropped points this morning as lawmakers in Europe take aim at crypto wallets.
articles.title: Bitcoin Briefly Dips Below $45,000 as EU Cracks Down on Crypto

articles.author: Robert Stevens
articles.description: The latest true crime documentary from Netflix digs into the saga of defunct crypto exchange QuadrigaCX—and its mysterious founder.
articles.title: Netflix's 'Trust No One': Who Was QuadrigaCX CEO Gerald Cotten?

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: The Stablecoin Transparency Act was introduced by Rep. Trey Hollingsworth and Sen. Bill Hagerty.
articles.title: Proposed Bill Would Require Stablecoins to Be Backed by Dollars, Government Securities

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: Nike is asking a court to destroy something that pretty much can't be destroyed.
articles.title: Nike Wants to 'Destroy' Unauthorized NFTs—How Will That Work?

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: USDC stablecoin issuer Circle, valued at $9 billion, chooses BNY Mellon as primary custodian for its reserves.
articles.title: USDC Reserves Will Be Custodied With BNY Mellon, Says Circle

articles.author: Scott Chipolina,Jeff Benson
articles.description: European Union lawmakers have voted to crack down on so-called unhosted cryptocurrency wallets.
articles.title: EU Parliament Votes to Impose KYC on Private Crypto Wallets

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The long-awaited Axie Infinity: Origin will launch a week late after the massive Ronin theft disclosed on Tuesday.
articles.title: Axie Infinity Delays Ethereum NFT Game Upgrade After $622M Hack

articles.description: Tax Day is coming, and the crypto world is paying attention. Decrypt's Jeff Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Adriana Hamacher discuss what people and businesses need to know about crypto and taxes with special guest Nicholas Mowbray of Baker Hostetler.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto, Taxes, and You

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Blockchain.com is integrating with Unstoppable Domains so wallet users can skip the alphanumeric addresses in favor of NFT usernames.
articles.title: Bitcoin Exchange Blockchain.com Allowing NFT Usernames for Its 82 Million Wallets

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Nevada-based Bitcoin miner CleanSpark has just inked a new deal to increase the firm's mining power and expand into the Lone Star state.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miner CleanSpark to Add 500 MW of Mining Power, Expand to Texas

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Socios fan token creator is inviting brands to build alongside it on Chiliz Chain 2.0, which launches its testnet today.
articles.title: Chiliz Plots Sports, Entertainment Crypto Ecosystem With 2.0 Chain

articles.author: Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Players of Storybook Brawl are up in arms against FTX’s purchase of the free-to-play game’s developer, Good Luck Games.
articles.title: Game Developer Faces User Backlash Following FTX Acquisition

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Gaming and NFT cryptos including Enjin and The Sandbox have risen over the week, despite a $552 million hack of Axie Infinity's Ronin sidechain.
articles.title: Metaverse Cryptocurrencies Enjoy Bullish Week Despite Axie Infinity's Ronin Hack

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: The agency wants to expand the definition of "dealer."
articles.title: How the SEC Proposal to Change One Definition Could 'Kill' DeFi

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: NFT trading volume on Solana has pumped by 80% over the past day, and the price of SOL appears to be benefiting from increased interest.
articles.title: Solana Surges as NFT Trading Rises 80% Following OpenSea Reveal

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: The company is now valued at $1 billion.
articles.title: LayerZero Raises $135M From Andreessen, FTX, Sequoia to Build Out 'Omnichain' Protocol

articles.author: Andrew Hayward,Stephen Graves
articles.description: Buy, battle, breed adorable monsters… and profit? That’s the hook behind Axie Infinity, the hottest crypto game on the market right now.
articles.title: What Is Axie Infinity? The Play-to-Earn NFT Game Taking Crypto by Storm

articles.description: Caitlin Long spent nearly two decades at big banks Credit Suisse and Morgan Stanley before she went all in on Bitcoin. Now her company Custodia is seeking to offer banking services to crypto companies long shut out by the big banks. She talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about identifying as a Bitcoin maximalist, crypto regulation in DC, and Web3 culture.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 6: Ditching Big Banks for Bitcoin With Caitlin Long

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Azuki is one of the biggest new NFT projects of 2022, and it set a collection record with a $1.42 million sale last night.
articles.title: Move Over Bored Apes: Rising Ethereum NFT Project Azuki Notches First $1M Sale

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Andreessen Horowitz, Seven Seven Six, Goodyear Ventures, Deutsche Telekom, and others are backing the latest crypto unicorn.
articles.title: Helium Crypto Wireless Network Founders Raise $200M, Rebrand to Nova Labs

articles.author: Ekin Genç,Stephen Graves
articles.description: There's a lot of money flowing into DeFi. And thanks to hacks and exploits, there's sometimes a lot of money flowing out, too.
articles.title: 12 Biggest DeFi Hacks and Heists

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Nifty Gateway’s marketplace will appear on Samsung’s new premium TVs, letting owners view and buy NFTs from the couch.
articles.title: Samsung Taps Nifty Gateway to Create Smart TV NFT Platform

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The in-game tokens powering the popular play-to-earn crypto game Axie Infinity have continued to tumble following yesterday’s hack.
articles.title: Axie Infinity Tokens AXS, SLP Reeling After $622M Ronin Hack

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Fan token platform Socios announced that soccer legend Lionel Messi has signed a new deal to promote the crypto firm for the next three years.
articles.title: Lionel Messi Signs Multi-Year Deal to Promote 'Fan Token' Firm Socios

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The native token behind DeFi’s popular money market Aave has risen more than 30% over the past 24 hours amid a flurry of new developments.
articles.title: DeFi Blue Chip Aave Mounts 30% Rise

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Opera is now supporting eight new blockchains, including the Bitcoin network, Ethereum scaler Polygon, and Solana.
articles.title: Web Browser Opera Adds Support for Bitcoin, Polygon, Solana

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: Brown—who's overseen efforts to release a self-hosted wallet—says she'll "be staying in the crypto space."
articles.title: Robinhood Crypto Lead Christine Brown Leaving to Start Crypto Venture

articles.author: MoreReese,DJ
articles.description: How are decisions made for billion-dollar protocols like Uniswap, Maker, and PancakeSwap? The answer, in part, is through governance tokens.
articles.title: What are Governance Tokens? How Token Owners Shape a DAO's Direction

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The 200,000 Bat Cowl NFTs will draw from Batman’s comic book history and provide various benefits.
articles.title: Batman NFTs Coming to Ethereum via Palm With Planned Metaverse Perks

articles.author: Jeff John Roberts
articles.description: The reactions to a campaign by Ripple's co-founder to change Bitcoin's code have been predictable—and often ferocious.
articles.title: Ripple Co-Founder Chris Larsen Blasted as 'Judas' After Proposal to Change Bitcoin

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Collections like Solana Monkey Business, Degenerate Apes, and Aurory appear headed to OpenSea after the firm confirms recent leaks.
articles.title: OpenSea Confirms It Will Start Listing Solana NFTs in April

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The Ronin bridge was drained of 173,600 ETH and 25.5M USDC via the use of “hacked private keys,” Sky Mavis says.
articles.title: Hacker Drains $622M From Axie Infinity’s Ronin Ethereum Sidechain

articles.description: Politicians are embracing crypto on both sides of the aisle. Matt West, running for congress in Oregon, Matthew Diemer, running for congress in Ohio, and former Wyoming Rep. Tyler Lindholm discussed crypto and politics on a panel with Decrypt's Jeff Roberts at Camp Ethereal in Wyoming. As Diemer pointed out, "We have a conservative Republican, a progressive Democrat, and a moderate Democrat on the same stage, unified by crypto and the idea of making sensible regulation."
articles.title: Crypto on the Campaign Trail: Matt West, Matthew Diemer, Tyler Lindholm at Camp Ethereal 2022

articles.description: Tax season is upon us, and crypto investors have questions. Tony Dhanjal, Head of Tax at crypto tax software service Koinly, shares tips in this sponsored segment.
articles.title: Crypto Taxes Got You Down? Software Can Help

articles.description: Anthony Georgiades, co-founder of Pastel Network, talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward at Camp Ethereal 2022 about NFT security and the importance of protecting your digital artwork.
articles.title: Pastel Network's Georgiades: How to Protect Your NFTs

articles.description: Andrew Yang, the former presidential and NYC mayoral candidate, talked crypto regulation in DC on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says the days of little or no crypto regulation in DC are "very very quickly coming to end" and that the question now is what the new rules will look like.
articles.title: Andrew Yang on Crypto Regulation in DC: 'This Train Is Coming. What's the Cargo?'

articles.description: Gitcoin co-founder Scott Moore tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson all about Gitcoin's GR13 grant, which is raising money for Ukraine and has matching participation from a range of Web3 names like OpenSea, OlympusDAO, NounsDAO, Polygon, Algorand, and more.
articles.title: Gitcoin's Scott Moore Talks Ukraine Fundraising Grant

articles.description: Robert Drost, Head of R&D at ConsenSys, talks Layer 2s and building atop Ethereum with James Prestwich of Nomad and Sreeram Kannan of LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming.
articles.title: The Importance of Layer 2: ConsenSys, Nomad, and LayrLabs at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: Jordan Garbis, co-founder of BeetsDAO, and Kent Barton, who does tokenomics at ShapeShift DAO, talk to Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming about how to start a DAO, the hurdles with growing them, how to handle tokenomics and reward structure, and how to approach bad behavior by DAO members. At the end, they also took questions from the audience.
articles.title: ShapeShift, BeetsDAO Talk DAO Creation and Governance at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: The former presidential candidate and NYC mayoral candidate has launched Lobby3, a DC lobbying DAO. He talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about his crypto journey, the potential of DAOs, and the need to blend a Web3 approach with "the old-fashioned way" to spur change in DC.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 5: Andrew Yang Wants You to Join His DAO

articles.description: Edward Snowden gives an extensive interview to Marta Belcher of Filecoin Foundation for Camp Ethereal 2022, taped on February 27. He talks about how governments view crypto as "an evolving threat," how crypto "transforms power relationships," why he thinks Ethereum "suffers from the same privacy problems as Bitcoin," and why he views central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) as "crypto-fascist currencies."
articles.title: Edward Snowden Talks Governments and Crypto, CBDCs, and Ethereum vs Bitcoin at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: Musician and DJ Dillon Francis and Big Night Entertainment managing partner Tim Bonito tell Decrypt's Kate Irwin about their deal for a Boston nightclub residency and record collaboration with DJ duo ESCAPΞPLAN, and give their takes on Ethereum vs Solana for buying and trading NFTs.
articles.title: Musician Dillon Francis on Ethereum vs Solana for NFTs

articles.description: Musician and DJ Dillon Francis tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin what drew him to NFTs, and heaps a lot of praise on DJ 3LAU for pioneering in the space and prompting more artists to get in.
articles.title: Musician Dillon Francis: Why I'm Getting Into NFTs

articles.description: ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin talked about Ethereum 2.0 timing and impact, the power of DAOs, and gave his honest take on NFTs, Solana, Polygon, and Biden's crypto executive order in an extensive fireside chat with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Ethereal 2022 in Wyoming.
articles.title: Joe Lubin Talks Ethereum 2.0, NFTs, and DAOs at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried sits down for a conversation with one of his heroes, the moral philosopher and Princeton University professor Peter Singer, exclusively for Camp Ethereal 2022, powered by Decrypt. They talk animal rights, climate change, effective giving, Bitcoin's energy use, and how crypto is helping Ukraine.
articles.title: Crypto and Effective Altruism: Sam Bankman-Fried Interviews Peter Singer at Camp Ethereal

articles.description: Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Decrypt Daily podcast host Matthew Diemer chat live in Wyoming about the crypto executive order and other insights from Camp Ethereal 2022.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Biden's Executive Order & Ethereal 2022

articles.description: As Russia’s invasion of Ukraine continues, Ukraine has raised more than $50 million in crypto donations—in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Polkadot, and even Dogecoin. Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Scott Chipolina, and Kate Irwin, joined by special guest Izabella Kaminska of The Blind Spot, discuss the biggest story in the world right now.
articles.title: Decrypting the Week 10: Ukraine Welcomes Crypto

articles.description: On Episode 4 of Decrypt's gm podcast, Muneeb Ali of Stacks gave Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts his take on why NFTs are so triggering to people. He understands why they're easy to make fun of or "dismiss as a toy," but expects them to be used for a whole range of important business purposes in the future.
articles.title: Muneeb Ali: It's 'Easy to Make Fun' of NFTs, But They Are Here to Stay
